name: Jump Dimitry's Walls
description:
You're a red square and Dimitry wants you to jump his walls. Unfortunately for you, Dimitry is a dick so he keeps moving the walls. What's worse is that he keeps spawning the square's mortal enemy - triangles! Can you JUMP DIMITRY'S WALLS!?!

This is a short game to get the idea "Geometry Wars but a platformer" out of my head. Collect squares to get points and avoid the triangles to survive. 

It started out life as part of a series of coding demonstrations for the games programming module I run at Swansea University. Download it, have a play and hopefully have fun :D

If you enjoy this please check our other games.
